```{python}
import pandas as pd, matplotlib.pyplot as plt, pathlib
from datetime import date
feat = pd.read_parquet('data/processed/features.parquet')
panel = pd.read_parquet('data/processed/event_panel.parquet')
feat.tail(3)
```

## Event Study – Örnek Grafik

```{python}
import numpy as np
sel = panel[panel['series'].str.contains('__logdiff')]
g = sel.groupby('t')['value'].mean().cumsum()
plt.figure()
g.plot()
plt.title('Seçim öncesi/sonrası ort. kümülatif log-değişim (örnek)')
plt.xlabel('Ay (t)'); plt.ylabel('Kümülatif'); plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
